clinical_study.official_title: Clinical Database for the Early Recognition of Pulmonary Parenchymal Involvement in Patients With Systemic Diseases Bearing a Risk for Interstitial Lung Disease

brief_summary.textblock: The purpose of this study is to establish a clinical database for patients bearing at risk for ILD (Interstitial Lung Disease) and to set up a prospective ILD Screening program for these patients.

primary_outcome.measure: DLCO%pred (carbon monoxide diffusing capacity) at time of ILD diagnosis
primary_outcome.description: The investigators aim to assess DLCO% pred at time of ILD diagnosis in patients undergoing a ILD Screening algorithm and compare to the retrospective patient cohort with diagnosed ILD and the DLCO%pred at time of ILD diagnosis

secondary_outcome.measure: FVC%pred (Forced vital capacity) at time of ILD diagnosis
secondary_outcome.description: The investigators aim to assess FVC% pred at time of ILD diagnosis in patients undergoing a ILD Screening algorithm and compare to the retrospective patient cohort with diagnosed ILD and the FVC%pred at time of ILD diagnosis

arm_group.description: patients who will undergo the prospective ILD Screening algorithm

intervention.description: assessment of interstitial lung disease using chest CT

biospec_descr.textblock: serum samples of prospectively included patients will be stored in the Biobank Graz

study_pop.textblock: Patients (females and males; above 18 yrs) with a known systemic disease bearing a risk for ILD but without diagnosed ILD and patients (females and males; above 18 yrs) with diagnosed ILD.
